AI Description: SPICE (Simple Protocol for Independent Computing Environments) is a remote display system that provides a way for virtualized guests to interact with a host. The SPICE server facilitates the sharing of USB devices, audio, video, and more between a guest and a host system. It enables high-quality interactive remote desktop experiences for virtual machines.
Core Features: Remote Display System, Allows Sharing Of Usb Devices, Audio, & Video, Facilitates High-Quality Interactive Remote Desktop Experiences, Enhances Virtual Machine Interaction With The Host System
General Tags: Remote Display, Virtualization, Usb Sharing, Audio-Video Sharing
